extendedInfo.description: Bored at work? Need motivation? Cash counter counts your money as you make it. Simply enter your wage and hours and sit back and watch your money count up!Every wondered how much money your boss pays you to you browse the internet instead of doing that report you hate? Now you can find out! Stuck in a boring meeting? No problem! Motivate yourself by watching your cash grow!Get it now before it's copied by 10 zillion other Android hacks!WARNING: Cash may increase depressingly slowly. Unless you're a millionaire, in which case you probably don't need this app.WARNING 2: This app does not magically earn you money. You have to earn the money yourself. I repeat: you have to get a job and make the money. This app will just count it. I won't pay you the money. I hope that's clear. I just thought I'd put this in writing in case anyone else is feeling like emailing and asking how they "get pay".Note: This is a WIDGET not an app! It won't appear in your app drawer. To install, go to your homescreen, press menu -> add -> widget. Select Cash Counter from the list which appears. Once the widget is on your screen, tap it to configure.FAQ:- Why?- I was bored mindless doing a temping job once and though this up.- It doesn't appear in my app drawer!- This is a widget so you've got to install it by pressing somewhere empty on your homescreen. The widget menu should pop up, and you can choose it from that.- But it doesn't appear in my app drawer and I haven't bothered to read this!- No problem, simply go to the Market and give it a really low rating along with a comment on how it doesn't work. Afterwards, uninstall it, leaving the comment and rating there forever. This will ensure anyone else interested in using the app will think it's broken!- It doesn't count!- The widget only counts during your work hours, after this it shows the total for the day. It should say 'Not working' at the bottom if it's not counting. If it doesn't then there's a problem! Please email and tell me.- It doesn't #$%*&*##&$ work on my Bluelans Sciphone / Kogan Agora / Kyocera Zio !- Feel free to contact me and vent your spleen. Please remember there's a lot of Android devices and I only have one to develop this on.- All this counting is draining my battery!- You can choose to update the widget every minute in the settings. This will drain your battery less. Note that this will stop the cool whirly counting effect, though.- I hate the notification messing up my nice tidy notification area!- Yeah, join the club. Unfortunately, Android recently changed the rules so any long-running program MUST show something in the notification area. Believe me, I hate it too and would love to get rid of it.. Just be glad I found a way to get rid of the status bar icon!- I've loaded the latest bleeding-edge mod onto my phone and, strangely, apps which run perfectly with normal, quality controlled Android manufacturer releases don't seem to work with this untested work-in-progress I found somewhere on the internet?- Please don't complain if apps don't work with your mod. I'm not going to overwrite my perfectly working manufacturer Android version to test if every new mod release works, sorry. Also, try Google: http://forum.cyanogenmod.com/topic/17247-cm7-rc1-widget-problem/

reviews.title: needs work
reviews.comment: Works great!! Just follow this simple rule.......Look, Don\'t touch. If you try to edit this Widget it resets. Uninstall!
reviews.author: Tom H

reviews.title: App is constantly restarting
reviews.comment: Every time you do anything to this app it restarts counter uninstalling may reinstall if yall fix this later on Needs more of a calendar type effect so you can put in more than a weeks worth of days I don\'t work same days every week and it restarts money if I adjust anything and needs a overtime option
reviews.author: brandon slade

reviews.title: Eh.
reviews.comment: My schedule changes on a weekly basis and there\'s not really a way to show that.  Yes I liked the FAQ area, but the AP is only okay.  I can\'t figure out how to remove it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Leaves a ghost icon on status bar. Needs option to remove from status bar. Amazing app other then that.  Desire s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My life was a wreck.
reviews.comment: Then I found cash counter. Works as advertised. Could use an overtime function, I had to actually do math to average base and OT pay together... I made a generous donation of $3.50. Hopefully this will cover most of the funding required to implement an overtime function.
reviews.author: Jared Hofstra

reviews.title: Congratulations
reviews.comment: Dude, you are a genios!! On every stress time on work I look at this widget to remember myself that I\'m being paid by doing that shiett, and works flawlessly!!
reviews.author: Andres Sierra

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Could use more customization options but otherwise just what I was looking for! Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: GUI could be improved a bit, but overall a great idea and nicely implemented. Will keep this one on my home screen!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I did find a bug: In the notification area, the hours and minutes count down like they should, the seconds count up.  Strange when you first see it.  Still an awesome widget!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: im unemployed but
reviews.comment: had to download after reading the best app description and \"disclaimer\" ever. made me smile :-) il set it to count how much unemployment benefit im earning sat on my butt playing with my phone :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great but not aplicable for my line of work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun app. Would be even better if it could calculate when i get overtime during a week.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app I own a unit now I can lie in bed and watch those wheels roll around. My goal is to make those cent wheels a blur.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: App counter re-starts if you shut down your phone and no option to re-start counter biweekly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Haha. How do I delete this APP? Jk...great work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs breaks included in your shift. And also a reset biweekly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very nice! Hubert.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great widget. Best description I\'ve read haha
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Comes in handy for when I am Camping Out whilst playing the game World War. i can keep a check on how much I am getting without going into the game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I downloaded this just to comment on the LOL of the faq. gave me a good chuckle!
reviews.author: A Google User
